options.name: Deadly Poisons
options.description: Your Poison recipes gain an extra dice of damage.

options.name: Improved Healing Potions
options.description: Your Healing Potion recipes gain an extra dice of Health restored.

options.name: Careful Chemist
options.description: Gain +1 Alchemy, +1 Concentration and increase the Required Checks against Potions you Craft by 1.

options.name: Non-Lethal Poisons
options.description: You can modify a Poison you are crafting to not deal fatal damage, and instead cause a Creature to become Unconscious for a number of hours equal to your Alchemy Bonus Modifier when they reach 0 Health.

options.name: Expanded Volatility
options.description: Potions you craft that specify a radius have that radius increased by 1 unit

options.name: Potent Potions
options.description: Healing Potions you craft heal for an additional amount of Health equal to your alchemy bonus modifier at the time of crafting. Additioanlly, Poisons you craft deal additional damage equal to half your alchemy bonus modifier.

options.name: Free Action : Apply Poison
options.description: You quickly apply a Vial of Poison to a Weapon or Piece of Ammunition.

options.name: Action : Toss Potion
options.description: As an action, you can toss a Potion to a friendly Creature within 6 units. They can use their Reaction to immediately consume the potion.

options.name: Advanced Alchemy
options.description: Gain +1 Alchemy and access to Alchemy Augmentations

options.name: Efficient Mixing
options.description: You Overcraft on Alchemy recipes when you roll an 11 or 12 and you produce 2 potions instead of 1.

options.name: Bolstering Potions
options.description: Your healing Potions grant Temporary Health that lasts until the end of the next Full Rest if a Creature consumes one while at Full Health.

options.name: Concentrated Potions
options.description: Gain +1 Alchemy. The Required Checks against Potions you Craft is increased by 2.

options.name: Taste Tester
options.description: Gain an Immunity to Poison and +2 Resilience

options.name: Free Action : Chug
options.description: You can quickly consume a Potion, not counting against the amount of objects you can consume on a given turn.

options.name: Master Alchemist
options.description: Gain +2 Alchemy and an extra dice on Poisons, Healing Potions and Potions with damaging effects on your alchemy recipes.
